Method Detail

getDescriptor

public static Descriptor getDescriptor(java.io.File basedir,
                                       java.lang.String productFilename)
                                throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
Load the descriptor file for the pde project. This will either load the product descriptor (based on the productFilename) or one of the eclipse artifacts in the following order: feature ("feature.xml"), fragment ("fragment.xml"), plugin ("plugin.xml").

Parameters:
basedir - the pde plugin base directory
productFilename - optional, if specified then the eclipse product file that will be returned.
Returns:
the descriptor for the pde project
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - build failures.

readPluginDescriptor

                                             throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
Load the plugin.xml via a Reader

Parameters:
reader - plugin file
Returns:
PluginDescriptor
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - build failures.

getPDEType

public static java.lang.String getPDEType(Descriptor descriptor)
Return the String version of the pdetype based on the descriptor.

Parameters:
descriptor - the project descriptor
Returns:
product, plugin, feature, or fragment based upon the descriptor.
